course_description: This first course is designed to introduce assessment and clinical reasoning skills. Family Nurse Practitioner students will develop competence in diagnosis and management of common health conditions in across the lifespan. Emphasis on common conditions commonly encountered within primary care.
prerequisites: NRSG 701D and NRSG 704D and NRSG 706D or equivalent transfer credits as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 1816, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: A. Abiri, Status: Open
